oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sally Was A Good Old Girl - Hank Cochran performance - 1962-02-01
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of Sally Was A Good Old Gal, written by Harlan Howard, produced by Joe Allison, recorded on February 1, 1962 at RCA Victor Studio in Nashville, TN, released by Liberty Records in May 1962, and performed by Hank Cochran (vocals), Harold Bradley (guitar), Ray Edenton (guitar), Buddy Emmons (steel), Bob Moore (bass), Buddy Harman (drums), and Hargus "Pig" Robbins (piano). Duplicate of TR003417_1.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Cochran
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Hank Cochran performs "Sally Was A Good Old Girl"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Howard, Harlan; Allison, Joe; Liberty Records; Cochran, Hank; Bradley, Harold (Guitarist); Edenton, Ray; Emmons, Buddy; Moore, Bob, 1932-; Harman, Buddy; Robbins, Hargus
